title: Nova
description:
Charting the adventures of Richard Rider who becomes a member of the Nova Corps, an intergalactic police force.  Basically Marvels version of the Green Lantern Corps.  Pack includes:

Nova v1-4
Appearances (Chronological and Non-Chronological)
Chronological Reading List

Extras, including:

Wallpapers
Rocket Blasters: Nova Fanzine
Ill-Begotten: The Samuel Saga Unpublished Series Outline - Ill-Begotten was a proposed eight issue limited series featuring the Avengers written by Jim Shooter.  If this had seen print things would have been very different for Richard Rider.



Released on http://ComicPirates.info
